member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.Resources.ExNotSupportedByImplementation
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This member is not supported by this implementation..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified TextSnapshotRange cannot be deleted..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.Resources.ExTextSnapshotRequiresCodeDocument
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified ITextSnapshot must be for an ICodeDocument..

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.SR
member.summary: Provides access to the string resources of this assembly, also allowing for their customization.
member.remarks:
Call the method to return a resolved resource string. If a custom string has been set for a specified string resource name, it will be returned. Otherwise, the default string resource value is returned.
If any of the resource strings are customized via a call to , it is best to do so before any other classes in this assembly are referenced, such as in the application startup.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.SR.ClearCustomStrings
member.summary: Removes all custom strings.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.SR.ContainsCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether a custom string is defined for the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource for which to search.
member.returns: true if a custom string is defined for the specified string resource; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.SR.GetCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns custom string that is stored for the specified string resource, if any.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The custom string that is stored for the specified string resource, if any.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Irony.SR.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource, by calling String.Format using supplied arguments.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
The arguments to pass to String.Format.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

The arguments to pass to String.Format.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.
